paragraph.heading: 1Importing new metrics
paragraph.paragraph:
To import a set of metrics from a file, you must have already clicked on
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_select_metrics_color.gif in the "Metric" tab of the context tool.

list.item: A dialog allows you to select a file containing a set of metrics.

After you have opened a file containing metrics, the following interface will pop up to help you making your selection:
/images/eiffelstudio/metrics_png/import.png
- On selecting a metric, its definition formula appears in the field "Formula of the selected metric", its unit appears in the "Unit of the selected metric" field.. - To import metrics from the selected file to the current system, you can either click on "Add->", or pick and drop the selected metric from the "New metrics" list to the "Current metrics" one - To remove a metric you have mistakenly imported, you can either click on "<-Remove", or pick and drop the selected metric from the "Current metrics" list to the "New metrics" one. - You can also reorder metrics using the pick and drop facility inside each list.

If you have introduced some changes, you have to save again on the
interface main interface .
Click on "Exit" to hide the interface.
